accomodationForm.transportLabel: Do you need transportation from the hotel to wedding venue?
accomodationForm.stayFromPlaceholder: Select a date you want to check into the hotel
accomodationForm.stayToPlaceholder: Select a date you want to check out of the hotel
accomodationForm.verdictGood: Hooray! We can cover all of your stay! 🎉
accomodationForm.verdictOverstay: We're sorry, but we can only cover your stay for the maximum of 5 days from {stayFrom} to {proposedStayTo}. You'd have to extend your stay at the hotel by yourself. 😢
accomodationForm.needTransportLabel: Do you need transportation from the hotel to the wedding venue?

miscForm.wishesFeedback2: We love that you're actually putting the time to write this 😍
miscForm.wishesFeedback5: We'll definitely read this after the wedding 💖
